articles.title: China calls for 'basic etiquette' after Philippine foreign minister's outburst - CNA
articles.description: BEIJING: China urged the Philippines on Tuesday (May 4) to observe "basic etiquette" and eschew megaphone diplomacy after the Southeast Asian nation's foreign minister used an expletive-laced Twitter message to demand that China's vessels leave disputed water…

articles.title: Indonesian woman sends poisoned satay to ex-boyfriend, ends up killing delivery man's son instead - AsiaOne
articles.description: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned — a vengeful 25-year-old in Indonesia recently tried to kill her ex-boyfriend by sending poisoned food to him. While the cyanide-laced satay never reached him, the delivery man took the food home and shared it with his f…

articles.title: MAG says no Malaysia Airlines, AirAsia merger plan - The Star Online
articles.description: Malaysia Aviation Group (MAG), the parent company of Malaysia Airlines Bhd, has put an end to the rumours surrounding the possible merger between the airline and low cost carrier AirAsia Group Bhd.

articles.title: Eight Asiatic lions test positive in COVID-19, first in India - The Hindu

articles.title: Amid India’s coronavirus crisis, Asia’s developing nations are all at risk - South China Morning Post
articles.description: From Laos, Vietnam and Thailand in Southeast Asia to Bhutan and Nepal bordering India, countries have been reporting significant surges.
